Create a new ClubJudge Venue.

Example

curl -H “Content-Type: application/json” -X POST / -d ‘{ \ “name”: “De Mast”, \ “reviewsCount”: 0, \ “commentsCount”: 0, \ “followersCount”: 0, \ “upcomingEventsCount”: 0, \ “keywords”: [ \ “word1”, \ “word2” \ ], \ “venueTypes”: [ \ { \ “name”: “Rooftop”, \ “type”: “VenueType” \ } \ ], \ “logo”: { \ “guid”: “fsd78f8sd-f45hfgdhgf5f5-f53ft24f5” \ }, \ “background”: { \ “guid”: “fsd78f8sd-f453gff5f5-f53ft24f5” \ }, \ “address”: { \ “street”: “Industrielaan 2”, \ “zipCode”: “8820 Torhout”, \ “geolocation”: { \ “lat”: 51.6478451, \ “lon”: 5.6437661 \ }, \ “city”: { \ “id”: 774, \ } \ }’ \ https://bifrost.clubjudge.com/v2/venues/221.json?token=userToken ```
